title: Marianne Williamson Talks Economy & Capitalism
itunes:title: Marianne Williamson Talks Economy & Capitalism
description:
Marrianne Williamson, Democratic presidential candidate, best-selling author and activist discusses her presidential campaign, the economy, trade, reparations, capitalism, and her Department of Peace proposal. She speaks to Bloomberg’s Kevin Cirilli, Chief Washington Correspondent for Bloomberg Television and Radio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
